title: Midwest Getaway in Historic Omaha Hotel
description: Experience the Midwest at the Kimpton Cottonwood Hotel, an IHG Hotel in Omaha’s historic Blackstone District. A reimagining of the famed Blackstone Hotel - built in 1916 and rumoured to be the birthplace of the Reuben sandwich - this city escape places you in the centre of Omaha’s most lively neighbourhood. Enjoy contemporary dining at The Committee Chophouse, then grab a nightcap at the tastefully decorated Cottonwood Room.
location_description: Kimpton Cottonwood Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 302 South 36th Street, Omaha, Nebraska 68131, United States
